htmlTemplatesSimple.nextFAQItem:
%(number)d. %(question)s

%(answer)s

clanMessageWarning.message: <font color='#8C8C7C' face='$FieldFont' size='14'>%(message)s </font><font color='#C9C9B6' face='$FieldFont' size='14'>%(fullClanName)s</font>

telecomVehicleReceived.message: <font color="#e9e2bf" face="$TitleFont" size="15">%(title)s</font> <font color="#8C8C7C" face="$FieldFont" size="14">%(comment)s</font> <font color="#595950" face="$FieldFont" size="14">%(subcomment)s</font>

telecomVehicleStatus.message: <font color="#e9e2bf" face="$TitleFont" size="15">%(title)s</font> <font color="#8C8C7C" face="$FieldFont" size="14">%(comment)s</font> <font color="#595950" face="$FieldFont" size="14">%(subcomment)s</font>

telecomVehicleRemoved.message: <font color="#e9e2bf" face="$TitleFont" size="15">%(title)s</font> <font color="#8C8C7C" face="$FieldFont" size="14">%(comment)s</font> <font color="#595950" face="$FieldFont" size="14">%(subcomment)s</font>

PersonalMissionFailedMessage.message: <font color="#E9E2BF" face="$TitleFont" size="15">_(#messenger:serviceChannelMessages/failedPersonalMission)</font> <font color="#8C8C7E" face="$FieldFont" size="14">_(#messenger:serviceChannelMessages/failedPersonalMission/operation)</font> <font color="#8C8C7E" face="$FieldFont" size="14">_(#messenger:serviceChannelMessages/failedPersonalMission/mission)</font> <font color="#8C8C7E" face="$FieldFont" size="14"></font> <font color="#EE7000" face="$FieldFont" size="14">_(#messenger:serviceChannelMessages/failedPersonalMission/message)</font>

LootBoxesAutoOpenMessage.message:
_(#messenger:serviceChannelMessages/lootBoxesAutoOpen/header)
